targets.expr:
sum_over_time(
    # any workers connected
    count(
        sum(dask_scheduler_workers{cluster_id="$cluster_id",state!="connected"})
        # only trust metric when scheduler is running
        and on () sum(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id", spec="scheduler"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0
    
    
    )[12h:1s]
)

sum_over_time(
(
# for at least 20% of workers
(
    # number of instances with
    count(
        # 60% or higher mem util (i.e., less than 40% available)
        (node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes{cluster_id="$cluster_id", spec="worker"} / node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{cluster_id="$cluster_id", spec="worker"}) < .4
    )
) / count(count by (instance) (sum_over_time(dask_worker_threads{cluster_id="$cluster_id"}[2m]) > 0)) > bool .2
# when tasks were processing
# and on () dask_scheduler_tasks{cluster_id="$cluster_id",state="processing"} > 0

)[12h:1s]
)

sum_over_time(
(
# for at least 20% of workers
(
    count(
        # write rate is at least 20MiB/s
        rate(node_disk_written_bytes_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id", spec="worker"}[$__rate_interval])
        and rate(node_disk_written_bytes_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id", spec="worker"}[$__rate_interval]) > 20000000
        # while there are tasks processing
        and on () dask_scheduler_tasks{cluster_id="$cluster_id",state="processing"} > 0
    )
    / count(count by (instance) (sum_over_time(dask_worker_threads{cluster_id="$cluster_id"}[2m]) > 0))
) > bool .2
)[12h:1s]
)

options.content:
* Duration only includes times
 when tasks on scheduler were
 in <u>processing</u> state

targets.expr:
sum (dask_worker_memory_bytes{cluster_id="$cluster_id", type="managed"})
# only trust metric when scheduler is running
and on () sum(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id", spec="scheduler"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0

sum (dask_worker_memory_bytes{cluster_id="$cluster_id", type="unmanaged"})
# only trust metric when scheduler is running
and on () sum(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id", spec="scheduler"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0

sum (dask_worker_memory_bytes{cluster_id="$cluster_id", type="spilled"})
# only trust metric when scheduler is running
and on () sum(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id", spec="scheduler"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0

sum(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{cluster_id="$cluster_id", spec="worker"})
# only trust metric when scheduler is running
and on () sum(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id", spec="scheduler"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0

sum(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{cluster_id="$cluster_id", spec="worker"} - node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes{cluster_id="$cluster_id", spec="worker"})
# only trust metric when scheduler is running
and on () sum(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id", spec="scheduler"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0

sum (dask_worker_memory_bytes{cluster_id="$cluster_id", type=~"unmanaged|managed"})
# only trust metric when scheduler is running
and on () sum(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id", spec="scheduler"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0

sum by(state) (dask_worker_tasks{cluster_id="$cluster_id",state="executing"})
# only trust metric when scheduler is running
and on () sum(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id", spec="scheduler"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0

sum(dask_worker_threads{cluster_id="$cluster_id"})
# only trust metric when scheduler is running
and on () sum(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id", spec="scheduler"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0

sum by(state) (dask_scheduler_tasks{cluster_id="$cluster_id"}) != 0
# only trust metric when scheduler is running
and on () sum(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id", spec="scheduler"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0

(dask_scheduler_workers{cluster_id="$cluster_id",state="connected"} - on () sum(dask_scheduler_workers{cluster_id="$cluster_id",state!="connected"}))
# only trust metric when scheduler is running
and on () sum(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id", spec="scheduler"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0

sum by(state) (dask_worker_tasks{cluster_id="$cluster_id",state!="executing"}) != 0
# only trust metric when scheduler is running
and on () sum(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id", spec="scheduler"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0

-(node_network_receive_bytes_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id", spec="scheduler"} - min_over_time(node_network_receive_bytes_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id", spec="scheduler"}[12h]))
# only trust metric when scheduler is running
and on () sum(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id", spec="scheduler"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0

sum(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id", spec="worker"})
# only trust metric when scheduler is running
and on () sum(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id", spec="scheduler"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0

sum(node_network_receive_bytes_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id", spec="worker"})
# only trust metric when scheduler is running
and on () sum(rate(node_cpu_seconds_total{cluster_id="$cluster_id", spec="scheduler"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0
